one thing i don't understand about the Chain-Lightning, wouldn't it just 
keep cycling throught the people it hits. like it leaves person 1, goes and 
hits person 2. and because person 1 is still close enough, it jumps back to 
him. and so on, untill 1 or 2 is dead.
